rows.label: qst200808_msg0001
rows.name: What is it? Do you need something?

rows.label: qst200808_msg0002
rows.name:
We need a splint. Could
you spare one for us?

rows.label: qst200808_msg0003
rows.name:
A splint? What are you
going to use it for?

rows.label: qst200808_msg0006
rows.name:
But to heal a Saffronia tree,
you'll need a very sturdy splint.

rows.label: qst200808_msg0007
rows.name: Can't you make one here, mo?

rows.label: qst200808_msg0009
rows.name:
It's just that to support a
heavy tree, you need special
materials and processing.

rows.label: qst200808_msg0011
rows.name:
If you gather five pieces of Healing
Teak, which can be found throughout Gula,
I should be able to make one for you.

rows.label: qst200808_msg0012
rows.name:
Thank you. We'll go
gather them right away!

rows.label: qst200808_msg0015
rows.name:
Ah, he's over there, staring
at the processing work, mo.
